name: HTML Fundamentals
description: Basics of HTML structure and elements.

lessons.name: Introduction to HTML
lessons.description: Overview of HTML and its role in web development.

lessons.name: HTML Tags and Elements
lessons.description: Understanding different HTML tags and their uses.

lessons.name: Forms and Input
lessons.description: Creating interactive forms with various input types.

lessons.name: HTML5 Features
lessons.description: Exploring new features and improvements in HTML5.

name: CSS Styling
description: Introduction to styling web pages using CSS.

lessons.name: Introduction to CSS
lessons.description: Basics of CSS and its role in web design.

lessons.name: Selectors and Properties
lessons.description: Understanding CSS selectors and properties for styling.

lessons.name: Box Model and Layout
lessons.description: Exploring the CSS box model and layout techniques.

lessons.name: Responsive Design
lessons.description: Creating responsive web pages using media queries.

name: JavaScript Basics
description: Introduction to JavaScript programming for web development.

lessons.name: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.description: Overview of JavaScript and its syntax.

lessons.name: Variables and Data Types
lessons.description: Understanding variables and data types in JavaScript.

lessons.name: Control Structures
lessons.description: Using conditional statements and loops in JavaScript.

lessons.name: Functions and Scope
lessons.description: Defining and using functions in JavaScript.

name: Advanced Web Development
description: Exploring advanced topics in web development.

lessons.name: DOM Manipulation
lessons.description: Interacting with the Document Object Model (DOM) using JavaScript.

lessons.name: Event Handling
lessons.description: Understanding and handling events in web pages.

lessons.name: APIs and AJAX
lessons.description: Using APIs and AJAX for asynchronous web communication.

lessons.name: Frameworks and Libraries
lessons.description: Introduction to popular web development frameworks and libraries.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Fundamental concepts in algorithm design and analysis.

lessons.name: Algorithm Basics
lessons.description: Understanding the basics of algorithms and their importance.

lessons.name: Asymptotic Notation
lessons.description: Introduction to Big O, Big Theta, and Big Omega notations.

lessons.name: Divide and Conquer
lessons.description: Exploring divide and conquer algorithms and their applications.

lessons.name: Greedy Algorithms
lessons.description: Understanding greedy algorithms and their problem-solving approach.

name: Sorting and Searching
description: In-depth study of sorting and searching algorithms.

lessons.name: Comparison-based Sorting
lessons.description: Exploring bubble sort, insertion sort, and quicksort.

lessons.name: Non-comparison Sorting
lessons.description: Understanding counting sort and radix sort.

lessons.name: Binary Search
lessons.description: Implementing and analyzing binary search.

lessons.name: Search Trees
lessons.description: Introduction to binary search trees and AVL trees.

name: Graph Algorithms
description: Exploring algorithms for graph data structures.

lessons.name: Graph Representations
lessons.description: Understanding different ways to represent graphs.

lessons.name: Graph Traversal
lessons.description: Exploring depth-first search and breadth-first search.

lessons.name: Shortest Path Algorithms
lessons.description: Studying Dijkstra's and Bellman-Ford algorithms.

lessons.name: Minimum Spanning Trees
lessons.description: Understanding Kruskal's and Prim's algorithms.

name: Advanced Topics in Algorithms
description: Studying advanced concepts and techniques in algorithm design.

lessons.name: Dynamic Programming
lessons.description: Exploring the principles and applications of dynamic programming.

lessons.name: Network Flows
lessons.description: Understanding the max-flow min-cut theorem and its applications.

lessons.name: NP-Completeness
lessons.description: Introduction to NP-complete problems and computational complexity.

lessons.name: Approximation Algorithms
lessons.description: Studying algorithms for finding approximate solutions to NP-hard problems.

name: Introduction to Database Systems
description: Overview of database systems and their applications.

lessons.name: Database Concepts
lessons.description: Understanding the basics of databases and their importance.

lessons.name: Database Models
lessons.description: Exploring different database models like relational, NoSQL, and graph databases.

lessons.name: SQL Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to SQL for querying and managing databases.

lessons.name: Database Design
lessons.description: Principles of database design and normalization.

name: Advanced SQL
description: In-depth exploration of SQL features and techniques.

lessons.name: Joins and Subqueries
lessons.description: Understanding complex SQL queries with joins and subqueries.

lessons.name: Aggregation and Grouping
lessons.description: Using SQL aggregate functions and grouping data.

lessons.name: Indexes and Performance
lessons.description: Improving database performance with indexes and optimization techniques.

lessons.name: Stored Procedures and Triggers
lessons.description: Creating and using stored procedures and triggers in SQL.

name: NoSQL Databases
description: Exploring non-relational database systems and their use cases.

lessons.name: Introduction to NoSQL
lessons.description: Overview of NoSQL databases and their types.

lessons.name: Document-Oriented Databases
lessons.description: Understanding document-oriented databases like MongoDB.

lessons.name: Key-Value Stores
lessons.description: Exploring key-value stores such as Redis and their applications.

lessons.name: Graph Databases
lessons.description: Studying graph databases like Neo4j and their use cases.

name: Database Security and Administration
description: Understanding the aspects of database security and administration.

lessons.name: Database Security Concepts
lessons.description: Exploring the principles of database security and data protection.

lessons.name: User Authentication and Authorization
lessons.description: Managing user access and permissions in database systems.

lessons.name: Backup and Recovery
lessons.description: Strategies for database backup and recovery.

lessons.name: Database Maintenance
lessons.description: Performing routine database maintenance tasks and monitoring.

description: Overview of different programming paradigms and their characteristics.

lessons.description: Understanding the concept of programming paradigms and their importance.

lessons.name: Imperative Programming
lessons.description: Exploring imperative programming and its principles.

lessons.name: Procedural Programming
lessons.description: Introduction to procedural programming and its characteristics.

lessons.name: Object-Oriented Programming
lessons.description: Understanding the basics of object-oriented programming.

lessons.description: Introduction to functional programming and its key concepts.

lessons.description: Understanding higher-order functions and their use in functional programming.

lessons.description: Exploring the concepts of immutability and pure functions.

lessons.description: Understanding the fundamentals of logic programming.

lessons.description: Exploring the Prolog programming language and its syntax.

lessons.description: Using logic programming for solving computational problems.

lessons.description: Studying advanced concepts in logic programming.

description: Understanding the concepts and techniques of concurrent and parallel programming.

lessons.description: Introduction to concurrency and its importance in programming.

lessons.name: Threads and Synchronization
lessons.description: Exploring threads and synchronization mechanisms.

lessons.description: Understanding different models for parallel programming.
